text: Refactoring an application has a lot of benefits —

it increases business agility, time to market, 
& can maximize the business value of AWS.
But designing and building the necessary infrastructure for
refactoring can be time-consuming–not to mention expensive.
That’s where AWS Migration Hub Refactor Spaces comes in

it provides an environment that makes 
refactoring applications in AWS faster & easier.

With Refactor Spaces, developers have the 
infrastructure they need to work —
so they can focus on extracting capabilities.
Which helps realize tangible value quickly—

with a small blast radius and minimal 
risk to the existing application.

Teams don’t need to pour hours into the upfront 
design and implementation, so getting started is easy.
It’s ready in minutes instead of months,

And it helps teams operate and deploy
their services independently
which increases business agility & reduces time to market.

Architects and app-owners can view their apps, 
network, and services across accounts at a glance
Simplifying the evolution of the app's architecture and encouraging service team independence.
Traffic from your existing application can be seamlessly migrated
to your new microservices — without your users knowing.

Plus, routing between multiple AWS 
accounts is easy and always adjustable.

Create your first environment today & realize
value from your refactor sooner
with AWS Migration Hub Refactor Spaces.
